name: Dodgey!
description:
Submission for SGDC Game Jam S (Scale)

Created by Nathaniel Escaro

Dodge floating shapes to rack up the highest score possible! As you play, more projectiles (and projectile types) will appear indicated by a scale above. Moving the projectile scale down will clear shapes higher than the new level, but your score will decrease and the scale will fill up much faster than before.

Good luck and have fun I suppose.

Controls:

  WASD or Arrow Keys: Move around

  Shift: Shrink player (for a brief period of time)

  Space: Move projectile scale down

This is my first time participating in a game jam and using the Godot engine, so enjoy my fine plate of spaghetti :)
